subject: product reviews
description_text: good day I hope this finds you well , https://youtu.be/QFIsyCEK7sg , this is my Youtube name/channel , im a newer content creator, im very interested in your ecosystem as my son (11yrs)  and i are keen sim racers but as its time to upgrade both our rigs from 2 logitech 920wheel n peddles setups to our first direct drive setups , i was wondering if we,d be able to review your bundles from 5NM-15NM and possibly one set of load cell peddles and one basic set , these are to be our first big reviews on our channel , i honestly dont know how any of this content creation will turnout im disabled and on low income so trying out content creation as a means to help with bills ,  we,d be forever grateful for some already used review samples but no matter what thank u for at least reading or checking out our channel , I know your company might be too big to want a smaller creator so i understand if yous cant help sorry if i posted this the wrong department
